problems.problem: Server sync failures and unresponsive support causing deck download failures and data loss
example_reviews: the day before my exams the server goes down ... i had spent weeks working on my cards ... and it was gone - and i could not log on.
my decks stopped downloading and syncing ... i've emailed the support group twice and after weeks nothing has been done.

problems.problem: Missing advanced Anki features (robust SRS, sorting/search, hierarchical tags, add-ons) making it unsuitable for heavy exam preparation
example_reviews: the spaced repetition software is not as robust as the original app ... inadequate sorting and search features.
it’s a less-powerful rip off of anki ... it has ~5% of the very powerful features and add-ons that are available (for free) for anki desktop.

problems.problem: Update broke ability to create a single reversible card (review front-back and back-front) without making two cards
example_reviews: recently an update went out that broke the ability to create a card once but review both front-back and back-front without having to create two cards.
my old decks still work but presently i cannot make a new deck with this functionality.

problems.problem: Ads and paywall practices: frequent ads after sessions and important features (cross-device sync, longer sessions, some functionality) behind paid tiers or separate subscriptions
example_reviews: very annoying to get an add after every sitting of flashcards ... many of the features (like one account across devices) seem to be behind a pay-wall.
there is a backside to this app called ankinexxus which apparently forces you to pay a yearly price ... it seems there is a limit to this app and they never mention it.

problems.problem: Study session customization removed/limited (cannot choose longer/50-card sessions)
example_reviews: the newest update seemingly eliminates longer study sessions, i.e., i can no longer go through settings and choose a 50-card study session instead of the standard 10.

problems.problem: Request for localization / UI language options (e.g., Japanese interface)
example_reviews: it would be great if there was an option to change language to japanese ... i use this app about 8 hours a day ... it would be great if it was in japanese.
